data.name: Shiftlings Demo
data.detailed_description:
The galaxy's biggest no-brainer!

Download the Shiftlings Demo now to control two adorably dim-witted space janitors in this quirky and colorful platform puzzler! Conjoined by an air hose, you must shift size and weight between the two cosmic custodians to avoid dangerous traps and fix problems before disaster strikes. Play through three of the most zany and exotic levels in the known (and unknown) universe to see if you have what it takes to be the galaxy’s greatest zork!

  • Enjoy outrageous 2-player co-op locally or across the galaxy online!
  • Over 50 interplanetary (and quite deadly) puzzles on 5 unique worlds!
  • Find tasty hidden collectibles to unlock perilous bonus levels!

data.short_description: Download the Shiftlings Demo now to control two adorably dim-witted space janitors on their quirky quest to repair the galaxy!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Norwegian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8, Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200 2.66 GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTS 250 or AMD Radeon HD 3870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c or later
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended for best experience.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8, Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200 2.66 GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 4770
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c or later
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended for best experience.
